summary: The module provides a suite of unit tests aimed at validating the functionality of a helper that generates a dictionary mapping physical types to their corresponding Astropy units. However, several test cases appear to be unused or serve as placeholders, suggesting incomplete or dead test code.
business_intent: Ensure that the utility for constructing physical type-to-unit mappings works correctly and raises appropriate errors for invalid inputs, thereby supporting reliable unit handling within the larger scientific library.
